title: "Exploring the Reasons: Why Women Seek Validation from Dating Apps More Than Men"
description:
"Exploring the Reasons: Why Women Seek Validation from Dating Apps More Than Men"
 #short
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "You think that 90 something percent of the men are horrifying is the problem that they're actually horrifying? Because like, by definition, like, how can 95% really be that bad? There are so many factors in this and you're just like creating this simple conclusion. I don't know where it comes from. I've interviewed and personally asked, you've asked hundreds of women and they've told you that they're going on for validation, purely. Yes. So these are women that have come on different trips I've organized and hundreds, hundreds. Yes. And they have literally, I have no intention of ever using Tinder, I just have it as entertainment. And why not? Like I go on there, I see all this stuff. I'm never going to check and read all those messages. That's surprising to me. Do you think there are men that are doing one? Men aren't doing it because if they did get an actual match or a date from a woman they found attractive, they would consider it and they would probably go. Because the sexual drive for a man in terms of just like pure, Hey, there's a sexual thing, I don't have to worry about it. I don't have to care. I'm just going to go do it. That drive is a lot stronger. They say it's like nine times stronger. Oh, more data. Where's what's up?
